Thorny Vines.name: Thorny Vines
Thorny Vines.flavor: A mass of thorn-tipped vines springs up from the ground, allowing your allies to pass unscathed even as your foes are lashed to deadly effect.
Thorny Vines.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts or ends its turn in the zone grants combat advantage until the start of its next turn.

Call Cyclone.name: Call Cyclone
Call Cyclone.flavor: Winds of destruction swirl as a storm of lightning and thunder pounds your enemies with natureâ€™s wrath.
Call Cyclone.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning and thunder damage.
Call Cyclone.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you end this effect as a minor action. You can move the zone up to 4 squares as a move action. Any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes 10 lightning and thunder damage.

Speak with Animals and Plants.name: Speak with Animals and Plants
Speak with Animals and Plants.flavor: The whispered calls of animals and the wind through the grass resolve into messages that you can understand.
Speak with Animals and Plants.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can speak to animal and plant life. Animals and plants can communicate what they have seen, heard, or otherwise sensed within the last hour (a hostile animal might try to mislead you). For the duration of the effect, you gain a +5 power bonus to Perception checks, and you cannot be surprised.
